description:
Tatsumi inherits Bulat’s Imperial Arms Incrusio after defeating the Three and vows to become even stronger.  Mine’s attitude towards Tatsumi seems to show a change after seeing his dedication during training... Meanwhile, General Esdeath receives news of the Three being defeated and in order to reinforce the army’s strength she organizes a special police force of  Imperial Arms users known only as the Jeagars.
Source: crunchyroll
